title: Merciless: House of Gravori
description: Merciless: House of GravorA Masters of Seduction NovellaBook 1Seeking vengeance for the murder of his brother, Incubus Master Devlin Gravori demands justice from the high court of the Nephilim. But fury and retribution are no match for the consuming desire he feels for Nahiri, the beautiful Nephilim warrior he claims as his hostage.
author: Lara Adrian
